reviewText: I have always loved the Righteous Brothers and they do a great job singing their best tunes on this DVD.

Standard Righteous Brothers concert with all their hits. Well worth the money if you're a fan. Good to see Bill Medley & Bobby Hatfield together at the top of their careers. Hatfield is no longer with us but will live through this concert.
This is the exact same DVD as "The Righteous Brothers in Concert" I bought both and am now stuck with them.
